title: Instructional Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Analysis of Assessment Impact Factors in Online Small-Scale Language Classes

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more impacts of class size changes on assessment outcomes
Learners can design two or more effective formative assessment strategies in small-scale online environments
Learners can analyze the correlation between personal interaction and class size in language learning through case-based studies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
